testsuite.name: Brand Onboarding
testsuite.details: As a Brand should able to create account successfully

testcase.name: BS001
testcase.summary: Verify When click on 'Create an account' user redirected to signup screen

step.actions: Click on 'Get started free'
step.expectedresults: User should redirected to signup screen successfully and URL path should be (https://dev-app.pickmyad.com/auth/signup)

testcase.name: BS002
testcase.summary: Verify whether user able to signup as a brand by filling required fields

step.actions: Click on 'Get started for free'
step.expectedresults: User should be redirected to Signup screen

step.actions: Enter Full name in the full name text box
step.expectedresults: Text box should accept the entered data

step.actions: Enter company name in the comapany name text box
step.expectedresults: Text box should accept the entered data

step.actions: Enter email address in the email textbox
step.expectedresults: Text box should accept the entered data

step.actions: Enter valid mobile number in the textbox
step.expectedresults: Textbox should accept entered mobile number

step.actions: Select source from the 'Where you heared about us?' field
step.expectedresults: Dropdown should display the selected source

step.actions: Click on 'create an account' button
step.expectedresults: User should signup successfully and redirected to OTP verification screen

custom_field.name: Test Input/Test Data
custom_field.value: First Name: Company name: Email address: Mobile number: Where you heared about us?

testcase.name: BS003
testcase.summary: Verify whether user able to signup as a brand without filling required fields

step.actions: Click on 'Get started for free'
step.expectedresults: User should be redirected to Signup screen

step.actions: Click on first name and skip the without enterig name
step.expectedresults: Error message should display "Full name is required"

step.actions: Click on company name and skip the without enterig name
step.expectedresults: Error message should display "Company name is required"

step.actions: Click on 'Email address' and skip without entering email address
step.expectedresults: Error message should display "Email address is required"

step.actions: Click on 'Email address' and skip without entering email address
step.expectedresults: Error message should display "Mobile number is required"

step.actions: Skip source from the 'Where you heared about us?' field
step.expectedresults: Error message should display "Source is required"

step.actions: Click on 'create an account' button
step.expectedresults: 'Create an account' button should not be enabled.

custom_field.name: Test Input/Test Data
custom_field.value: First Name: Company name: Email address: Mobile number: Where you heared about us?

testcase.name: BS004
testcase.summary: Verify whether user able to signup as a brand by filling invalid email address

step.actions: Click on 'Get started for free'
step.expectedresults: User should be redirected to Signup screen

step.actions: Enter First name in the first name field
step.expectedresults: Text box should accept the entered data

step.actions: Enter company name in the comapany name text box
step.expectedresults: Text box should accept the entered data

step.actions: Enter invalid email address
step.expectedresults: Error message should display "Enter valid email address"

step.actions: Enter valid mobile number in the textbox
step.expectedresults: Textbox should accept entered mobile number

step.actions: Select source from the 'Where you heared about us?' field
step.expectedresults: Dropdown should display the selected source

step.actions: Click on 'create an account' button
step.expectedresults: 'Create an account' button should not be enabled.

custom_field.name: Test Input/Test Data
custom_field.value: First Name: Company name: Email address: Mobile number: Where you heared about us?

testcase.name: BS005
testcase.summary: Verify whether user able to signup as a brand by filling invalid mobile number

step.actions: Click on 'Get started for free'
step.expectedresults: User should be redirected to Signup screen

step.actions: Enter first name in the first name text box
step.expectedresults: Text box should accept the entered data

step.actions: Enter company name in the comapany name text box
step.expectedresults: Text box should accept the entered data

step.actions: Enter valid email address in the email field
step.expectedresults: Textbox should accept the entered data

step.actions: Enter invalid mobile number in the textbox
step.expectedresults: Error message should display 'Enter valid mobile number'

step.actions: Select source from the 'Where you heared about us?' field
step.expectedresults: Dropdown should display the selected source

step.actions: Click on 'create an account' button
step.expectedresults: 'Create an account' button should not be enabled.

custom_field.name: Test Input/Test Data
custom_field.value: First Name: Company name: Email address: Mobile number: Where you heared about us?

testcase.name: BS006
testcase.summary: Verify whether user able to signup as a brand by filling already registered email address

step.actions: Click on 'Get started for free'
step.expectedresults: User should be redirected to Signup screen

step.actions: Enter First name in the first name field
step.expectedresults: Text box should accept the entered data

step.actions: Enter company name in the comapany name text box
step.expectedresults: Text box should accept the entered data

step.actions: Enter email address
step.expectedresults: Error message should display "Email address already taken"

step.actions: Enter valid mobile number in the textbox
step.expectedresults: Textbox should accept entered mobile number

step.actions: Select source from the 'Where you heared about us?' field
step.expectedresults: Dropdown should display the selected source

step.actions: Click on 'create an account' button
step.expectedresults: 'Create an account' button should not be enabled.

custom_field.name: Test Input/Test Data
custom_field.value: First Name: Company name: Email address: Mobile number: Where you heared about us?

testcase.name: BS007
testcase.summary: Verify whether user able to signup as a brand by filling already registered mobile number

step.actions: Click on 'Get started for free'
step.expectedresults: User should be redirected to Signup screen

step.actions: Enter first name in the first name text box
step.expectedresults: Text box should accept the entered data

step.actions: Enter company name in the comapany name text box
step.expectedresults: Text box should accept the entered data

step.actions: Enter valid email address in the email field
step.expectedresults: Textbox should accept the entered data

step.actions: Enter mobile number in the textbox
step.expectedresults: Error message should display 'Mobile number already exist'

step.actions: Select source from the 'Where you heared about us?' field
step.expectedresults: Dropdown should display the selected source

step.actions: Click on 'create an account' button
step.expectedresults: 'Create an account' button should not be enabled.

custom_field.name: Test Input/Test Data
custom_field.value: First Name: Company name: Email address: Mobile number: Where you heared about us?

testcase.name: BS008
testcase.summary: Verify whether user is redirected to OTP screen after filling the signup form
testcase.preconditions:
URL should be up and running

Filled signup form with valid mobile number

step.actions: Click on 'Create an account'
step.expectedresults: User should be redirected to OTP screen successfully

testcase.name: BS009
testcase.summary: Verify by filling valid OTP user able to proceed onboard screen
testcase.preconditions:
URL is up and running

Signup form details are filled with valid mobile number

step.actions: Enter valid OTP
step.expectedresults: Mobile number is verified successfully and user redirected to onboard screen successfully

testcase.name: BS010
testcase.summary: Verify by filling invalid OTP user able to proceed onboard screen
testcase.preconditions:
URL is up and running

Signup form details are filled with valid mobile number

step.actions: Enter valid OTP
step.expectedresults: Mobile number is verified successfully and user redirected to onboard screen successfully

testcase.name: BS011
testcase.summary: Verify whether user able to proceed onboard screen without filling OTP
testcase.preconditions:
URL is up and running

Signup form details are filled with valid mobile number

step.actions: Click on OTP field skip without entering mobile number
step.expectedresults: Error message should display 'Enter OTP' and Verify button should be disabled

testcase.name: BS012
testcase.summary: Check if the timer becomes 0 'Resend OTP' button is enabled
testcase.preconditions:
URL should be up and running

Completed signup form by filling valid details

testcase.name: BS013
testcase.summary: Verify when click on 'Resend OTP' timer will be enabled for OTP
testcase.preconditions:
URL should be and running

Completed signup form by filling valid details

testcase.name: BS014
testcase.summary: Verify after successful OTP verification user redirected to stepper screen
testcase.preconditions:
URL should be up and running

Mobile OTP verified successfully

testcase.name: BS015
testcase.summary: Check stepper screen title is displayed as 'select your languages for communication'
testcase.preconditions:
URL should be up and running

OTP should be verified successfully
